channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Supporting multiple .NET SDK versions in analyzers and source generators
item.description: In this post I describe why source generators might need to work with multiple versions of the .NET SDK and how NuGet packages support this in .NET 6 Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/supporting-multiple-sdk-versions-in-analyzers-and-source-generators/

item.title: Accessing MSBuild properties and user configuration from source generators: Creating a source generator - Part 13
item.description: In this post I describe how to read MSBuild settings from inside a source generator, and how to use this to allow user configuration of your generator Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/creating-a-source-generator-part-13-providing-and-accessing-msbuild-settings-in-source-generators/
